title: Pizza
directions: In a small bowl mix yeast with honey and beer or water.
In a medium bowl put half of the flour and salt.
When yest bowl is foamy add to flour bowl, knead and add flour and water until good consistency is reached.
Place dough in a greased medium bowl and put in fridge for 6 or more hours.
When ready to cook mix tomato sauce, tomato paste, pizza seasoning and sun dried tomatoes in a bowl.
Spread half of dough into a disc pull up crust ridges place on cooking tray or pizza peal covered in cornmeal.
Spread on tomato sauce, place on toppings and then the ball of mozzarella shredded.
Cook for 16 minutes at 425° in oven.
